resources.string: CREATE TABLE %1$s (%2$s INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, %3$s DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, %4$s INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE %1$s (%2$s INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, %3$s INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY %3$s REFERENCES %4$s(%3$s) , %5$s INTEGER, %6$s TEXT)
CREATE TABLE %1$s (%2$s INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, %3$s TEXT, %4$s TEXT)
